_description: Learned patterns for detecting potential issues in music libraries
_usage: When scanning albums, check against these patterns to proactively identify issues

patterns.name: Wrong Embedded Cover Art
patterns.description: Album has high-quality embedded cover art that doesn't match the album

conditions: Cover art exists with good size (>50KB) and coverage (>90%)
iTunes search returns a different cover art hash
Folder name doesn't appear in cover art text (via visual check)

patterns.example: Ben Harper/Diamonds On The Inside - had wrong cover embedded

patterns.name: Truncated Folder Name
patterns.description: Folder name appears to be cut off mid-word

conditions: Folder name ends with incomplete word or '...'
Track metadata contains longer album name

patterns.example: Beginner's Guide to World Music - 2006 Wo (should be World Cup Edition)

patterns.name: Windows Character Substitution
patterns.description: Folder has underscore where metadata has colon or other special char

conditions: Folder contains '_' followed by space or capital letter
Track metadata has ':' in same position

patterns.name: Multi-Disc Album Not Consolidated
patterns.description: Multiple folders for same album with disc indicators

conditions: Multiple folders with same base name
Folders contain [Disc N], Disc N, or CD N pattern

patterns.name: Missing folder.jpg Despite Embedded Art
patterns.description: Tracks have embedded cover art but no folder.jpg exists
